resources.string: Dear family, friends, and all those gathered here, Today, we come together to remember and celebrate the life of [Deceased\'s Name], a remarkable person whose presence was a blessing to us all. In these few words, I hope to capture the essence of a life that was not only lived but was lived with purpose, love, and an incredible strength of spirit.
(This infomation is only visible to farewell NOT PUBLIC)
